E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 5/14/1977
Subject: Mike T. Stanton healing process
Mike T. Stanton is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Wednesday, 5/14/1977
Subject: Wondering
Boss,
What about my playing time? Am I not
good enough to play regularly for this
team? I'm not a happy camper right now. If that doesn't
change, trade me!

Regards,
Bill Freehan

I would like to negotiate a contract extension!
Please let me know if you are interested!

Regards,
Bob Bailey
